title: Ex-FIA deputy president Robert Reid: 'speaking up came at a cost'
summary: Former FIA second-in command Robert Reid has expanded on the reasons behind his exit, saying that he was excluded after raising concerns over "fundamental principles" such as transparency and accountability

qa_pairs.question: What is the role of the FIA in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: The FIA is the governing body that oversees the regulations and organization of Formula 1 and other motorsport events.
wrong_options: The FIA is responsible for team sponsorship deals.
The FIA determines the tire specifications for each race.
The FIA manages the broadcasting rights for F1 races.

qa_pairs.question: Who was Robert Reid in relation to the FIA?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Robert Reid was the deputy president of the FIA.
wrong_options: Robert Reid was the chief engineer for Mercedes.
Robert Reid was a race director for Formula 1.
Robert Reid was a driver for McLaren.
